description:
Ageha has one last chance to stop her sister from making the biggest mistake of her life: marrying Sabato! Later, Rinne discovers that Rokumon may have a secret food supply.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Ring and Stamp / Food at the Porch / Black Cat Children`s Association
La bague et le sceau / De la nourriture sous la véranda / La fête des chatons noirs
Yubiwa to Inkan / Engawa no Esa / Kuroneko Kodomo Kai
指輪と印鑑 / 縁側のエサ / 黒猫こども会
